name: The Fox-Eyed Villain of the Demon Academy
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhwa
content: The very last moment before the novel was about the end...The strongest villain met a pitiful fate.But that wasn&#039t the end.&quotSo, this is how I die.&quotI, who was once the author, woke up as the fox-eyed villian who was never once understood.A fallen family.A life thrown away for revenge.A future sealed in tragedy.I&#039m going to rewrite it all.This villain&#039s end... will be reversed.Original NovelOriginal Webtoon: KakaoPage, Daum
